stimulusHtml: Two particles start at the origin and move along the x-axis. For  0≤t≤10 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CA6@ , their respective position functions are given by x 1 =sint MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D17@ and x 2 = e −2t −1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3ED1@ . For how many values of t do the particles have the same velocity?
